title: Exhibitor Directory

images.alt: Public link that can called in the event website to display exhibitor list

overview.description: A system for managing an exhibitor directory and generating dynamic lists
overview.details: Developed a comprehensive Exhibitor Directory system that allows users to fill in details, generating a complete exhibitor list. The admin panel enables easy management of the directory, including the integration of sponsor information and dynamic PDF list generation.

features: User-friendly exhibitor directory form for data entry
Admin panel for managing exhibitor information
Dynamic PDF list generation of exhibitors
